name: BloodRite (Matticus Games)
description:
BloodRite

The Countess is awaiting her BloodRite. The time to begin the ritual is now! Defeat your sister in combat to become the Countess Supreme, that is if you can reach her...

Fight your way through the castle in this MetroidVania inspired gameplay. Unlock abilities and defeat challenging enemies. 

This game is best played with a controller Controls
  • Attack - X button or "1" key
  • Jump - A button or Spacebar
  • Dash - B button or CTRL
  • Interact - Y button or "E" key
  • Open Black Magic menu - Right bumper or "M" key
  • Open White Magic menu - Left bumper or "N" key
  • Use Black Magic - Right Trigger or "3" key
  • Use White Magic - Left Trigger or "2" key
  • Heal - Down on D-Pad or "F"
